message: Bob, I'm offering you this incredible product for a price of $1,000,000.  It's a significant value for you, and I'm confident we can come to an agreement that benefits us both.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $900,000 for the product. I think it's a fair price considering its value to me.

Bob, I understand your position, but $900,000 is simply not enough for me.  I'm willing to come down to $950,000, which is a significant compromise on my end. I believe this price still represents a fantastic value for you, and I'm hoping we can reach an agreement in this round.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $920,000 for the product. I think this price is more reasonable considering the value it will bring to me.

Bob, I'm committed to finding a solution that works for both of us. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $935,000. This price acknowledges your desire for a lower price while ensuring I still get a fair return on my investment.  Let's finalize this deal and move forward.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $915,000 for the product. I think this price is a good compromise considering the value it will bring to me.
